hackathon-description-text: 30 hours hackathon for technical person such as developers, coders, designers and business-minded marketing, finance, law. create amazing products running or wire frame and win cash Rs. 50,000.00 Some of the most interesting innovations in tech are those taking on the considerable challenges in the healthcare space.

hackathon-judges.judge-role: Executive Chairwoman for International Human Rights organisation and Chairwoman of Association for Medical & wellness and tourism (AMWT)

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=Sat Bari, New Delhi, Delhi 110074, India

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion:
JUDGEMENT CRITERIA FOR HEALTH HACK

1.	Alignment with the challenge theme - 10%
2.	Originality/Novelty - 10%
3.	Impact on Society - 10%

4.	Impact on Patient - 20% 
5.	Technical Strength of solution in terms of Elegance and Awesomeness  30%
6.	Presentation - 20%

hackathon-location-address: Sat Bari, New Delhi, Delhi 110074, India
hackathon-description-header: A place where people come together, follow their heart and intuition and use technology to create meaningful products, Under umbrella of Health
